title: useState
description: It allows you to add state in functional components.
realLife: Jaise tu mobile ka brightness manually badhata hai, waise hi state change karke UI badalta hai.

title: event bubbling
description: An event starts from the deepest element and bubbles up to the parent.
realLife: Jaise glass gira toh awaaz pehle ground se, phir room mein spread hoti hai.

title: map()
description: Creates a new array by applying a function to each element.
realLife: Jaise sabhi students ke marks ko double karna ek list mein.
